::Striker::

Striker's eyes widen as he sees Savage coming down on him. His jetpack 
switches direction, sending him backwards, Savage's face going only inches in 
front of him.

He continues to fire, flying backwards. Mechfluid was oozing out of the 
melted and burned armor of his chest.
